name: LWD # Pieces
functionStatement: Channel and floodplain structure supply depth, velocity, substrate diversity, and vegetation to support native organisms through all life stages.
descriptionMarkdown: In-stream habitat structure metric (pools/riffles/wood) indicating habitat diversity and cover for aquatic organisms.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Walk a representative reach and count large woody debris pieces/jams per unit length (e.g., per 100 m) following SQT definitions.

inputs.label: LWD # Pieces
inputs.helpMarkdown: Field habitat mapping (riffle/pool units, wood counts) with optional aerial imagery support.

references: high-resolution imagery for jam identification where feasible
